verbs.description: In the wake of [ARG1: the controversy] [V: surrounding] [ARG2: Roseanne Barr] , President Trump on Thursday lashed out at Disney CEO Bob Iger asking why Iger did not apologize for a corrected ABC News report late last year . " Iger , where is my call of apology ? " Trump asked in a tweet Thursday morning .
